page.title: 04Who lives in this area ?
page.content: These are the results of a random survey of 54 householders in this area. 2 to 3 people lived in the majority of houses. No house had more than 6 occupants. The average age of houses within the survey was 34 years.The oldest house was built over 200 years ago, whilst the newest had been completed in the last 3 years. The householders questioned had lived in their present house for an average of 17 years.The longest any householder had lived in their present house was 45 years whereas the most recent occupant had lived there only a matter of weeks. 28% of householders had been brought up in the village they were presently living in. Less than 10% of the houses did not have the use of a car.
